answers.answer: I already feel it and I'm only 17 weeks.  =p

I have been nesting fir awhile now. Somedays it's like ocd where I just want to get so much done and sometimes it's like specific things. One day I had to go buy a bunch of wall plug in covers because I just had to have it done!
I'm 19 weeks and i think i randomly get the nesting urge. I'm high risk so there is a lot i shouldn't be doing or lifting and it is driving my boyfriend crazy lol
I am 20 weeks today and all I want to do is work on the nursery!  Nesting like crazy! Everyone says it's too soon but I want it to be perfect by the time my little boy is here :)
lol yeah...it's getting in the way of school and work at times...I get to school and work but my brain thinks that nesting is number one priority and I cut it close to being late a lot.
Yes been going on since 23 weeks. Driving everyone crazy!

question: I'm close to only 25 weeks but my nesting urge today is so strong! I still have a few items to get and I feel like my bedroom and living room aren't quite "comfortable" for me to care for my soon to be newborn in the way I care for newborns....I had my daughter at 32 weeks and my son at 37 because I was induced with eclampsia/preeclampsia...maybe I'm subconsciously thinking I'm closer than I am...but I am in nesting mode so bad today....anyone else have this happen so early and intensly?
title: Nesting urge!
